00019 //---------------------------------------------------------
00020 //   SeqMsg
00021 //    message format for gui -> sequencer messages
00022 //---------------------------------------------------------
00023 
00024 enum { SEQ_TEMPO_CHANGE, SEQ_PLAY };
00025 
00026 struct SeqMsg {
00027       int id;
00028       int data1;
00029       int data2;
00030       int data3;
00031       };
00032 
00033 //---------------------------------------------------------
00034 //   Event
00035 //    sequencer event type (note on, note off)
00036 //---------------------------------------------------------
00037 
00038 struct Event {
00039       int type;         // not used yet
00040       int channel;
00041       int val1;         // pitch
00042       int val2;         // velocity
00043       Note* note;       // used to mark the currently played notes
00044       };
00045 
00046 typedef std::multimap<int, Event, std::less<int> > EList;
00047 typedef EList::iterator iEvent;
00048 typedef EList::reverse_iterator riEvent;
00049 typedef EList::const_iterator ciEvent;
00050 typedef std::pair <iEvent, iEvent> EventRange;
00051 
00052 typedef std::map<int, Event, std::less<int> > AList;
00053 typedef AList::iterator aEvent;
00054 
00055 //---------------------------------------------------------
00056 //   Seq
00057 //    sequencer
00058 //---------------------------------------------------------
00059 
00060 class Seq : public QObject {
00061       Q_OBJECT
00062 
00063       Score* cs;
00064       bool running;                       // true if sequencer is available
00065       int state;                          // STOP, PLAY, START_PLAY
00066 
00067       Synth* synti;
00068       Audio* audio;
00069       int fromThreadFdw, fromThreadFdr;   // message pipe
00070       int sigFd;                          // pipe fd for messages to gui
00071 
00072       EList events;                       // playlist
00073       bool playlistValid;
00074       AList _activeNotes;                 // currently sounding notes
00075       int playFrame;
00076       ciEvent playPos, guiPos;
00077       int endTick;
00078 
00079       float _volume;
00080 
00081       QTimer* heartBeatTimer;
00082 
00083       int toGui(char c) { return write(sigFd, &c, 1); }
00084       void collectEvents();
00085       void stopTransport();
00086       void startTransport();
00087       int frame2tick(int frame) const;
00088       int tick2frame(int tick) const;
00089 
00090    private slots:
00091       void seqMessage(int fd);
00092       void heartBeat();
00093 
00094    public slots:
00095       void start();
00096       void stop();
00097       void rewindStart();
00098       void setVolume(float);
00099       void setTempo(int);
00100       void setPos(int);
00101 
00102    signals:
00103       void started();
00104       void stopped();
00105 
00106    public:
00107       enum { STOP, PLAY, START_PLAY };
00108 
00109       Seq();
00110       ~Seq();
00111       bool loadSoundFont(const char* s);
00112       bool init();
00113       bool isRunning() const    { return running; }
00114       bool isPlaying() const    { return state == PLAY; }
00115       void process(unsigned);
00116       std::list<QString> inputPorts();
00117       AList& activeNotes()      { return _activeNotes; }
00118       int sampleRate() const;
00119       int getEndTick() const    { return endTick; }
00120       float volume() const      {  return _volume; }
00121       bool isRealtime() const;
00122       void invalidatePlaylist() { playlistValid = false; }
00123       void sendMessage(SeqMsg&) const;
00124       void playNote(int, int, int) const;
00125       void setController(int, int, int) const;
00126       void setScore(Score* s)  { cs = s; }
00127       };
